statements: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM logs WHERE log_id = 5;
SELECT log_message FROM logs WHERE server_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE server_id = 3 AND log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, server_id FROM logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM logs WHERE server_id = 10 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT server_id FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY server_id;
SELECT server_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM logs GROUP BY server_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM log_data ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage, disk_usage FROM system_performance WHERE performance_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM log_data WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT server_id FROM system_performance ORDER BY server_id;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM log_data WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM log_data WHERE server_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message, server_id FROM log_data WHERE log_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT server_id, AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage FROM system_performance GROUP BY server_id HAVING avg_cpu_usage > 50;
SELECT server_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM log_data WHERE server_id IN (2, 3) GROUP BY server_id ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT server_id, MAX(memory_usage) AS max_memory_usage FROM system_performance GROUP BY server_id HAVING max_memory_usage < 80;
SELECT * FROM log_data ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM log_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT server_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM performance_data WHERE cpu_usage > 50;
SELECT server_name FROM edge_servers WHERE server_location = 'USA';
SELECT server_id, server_name, server_location FROM edge_servers ORDER BY server_name;
SELECT * FROM log_data WHERE log_timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM log_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT server_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM performance_data WHERE cpu_usage > 50 AND memory_usage < 80 ORDER BY cpu_usage DESC, memory_usage ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT server_name, server_location FROM edge_servers WHERE server_location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM log_data LEFT JOIN performance_data ON log_data.id = performance_data.id ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM edge_server_logs;
SELECT server_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM edge_server_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM edge_server_logs WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT server_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM edge_server_logs GROUP BY server_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT server_id, AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage FROM server_performance_metrics GROUP BY server_id HAVING AVG(cpu_usage) > 70;
SELECT * FROM edge_server_logs WHERE server_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM edge_server_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT server_id, AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage FROM server_performance_metrics GROUP BY server_id HAVING AVG(cpu_usage) > 80;
SELECT server_id, status_message, status_timestamp FROM server_status WHERE status_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY status_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM server_events GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY event_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM edge_server_logs WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM system_logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR';
SELECT server_id, metric_type, metric_value FROM server_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_type = 'CPU Usage' AND metric_value > 80;
SELECT status_code, status_message FROM server_status WHERE server_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM edge_server_logs WHERE server_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM system_logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT server_id, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM server_metrics GROUP BY server_id HAVING avg_value > 100 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_type IN ('CPU', 'Memory') AND timestamp > '2022-04-01' ORDER BY server_id, timestamp;
SELECT server_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM edge_server_logs GROUP BY server_id HAVING log_count > 5 ORDER BY server_id ASC, log_count DESC;
